data.actual_result: Only the names of users are resized, everything else ("invite friends", "copy", "invite") dont rescale.

data.short_description: Text doesn't resize when attempting to invite people to your server.
data.steps_to_repro: - set the text size to 150 (Easily visible) - head on to a server where you can invite people - press the invite people button (dropdown menu of a server)
